New in this update:
The 4Sale app now automatically opens in the language you selected when creating your profile. If no selection was made, the 4Sale app will automatically open in your device language.

In this update is our engaging NEW feature Power Pins. Power Pins allows you to post videos or photos in a range of exciting new locations. Upload from the Power Pin button or select Power Pins as an add-on when you post your listing. Power Pins help you:

In this update is our engaging NEW feature Power Pins. Power Pins allows you to post videos or photos in a range of exciting new locations. Upload from the Power Pin button or select Power Pins as an add-on when you post your listing. Power Pins help you:

Every update brings new features and improvements to your 4Sale experience. In this update:

- We’ve organized our home screen to make it easier to navigate to key categories.
- You can now update your listing, boost it, or change settings right

Every update brings new features and improvements to your 4Sale experience. In this update:

- We’ve organized our home screen to make it easier to navigate to key categories.
- You can now update your listing, boost it, or change settings right

- Registering is easier than ever: now you can receive your OTP by WhatsApp. If you don’t use WhatsApp, you can still receive your OTP via SMS or Voice Call.
- Introducing the Power Pins tutorial - learn more about this engaging new feature!
